alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jones, southwestern Lenoir, northwestern Onslow and central Duplin Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deep Run, or 14 miles southwest of Kinston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kornegay, Richlands, Beulaville, Deep Run, Comfort, Kenansville, Potters Hill, Petersburg, Pleasant Hill, Albertson, Sarecta, Pink Hill and Hargetts Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
